content.raw:
Hi Carlos,

I have to disagree with you here, I think cameras are special for three reasons;

* They are the only sensor that it is commonly installed in multiples.  
* In VRX, these sensors are also named for the position they hold e.g. /middle\_right\_camera.  The GPS, Lidar and IMU sensors are named after their type.
* They also generate multiple image streams with different properties.  For this reason, when recording bag data, I like to record all topics but excluding camera topics.  Putting 

Changing /midle\_right\_camera/ to /cameras/middle\_right does not add any extra characters to the topic name, while still grouping them together logically.  For this reason, I think it is reasonable to give cameras there own subnamespace.  

Regards,

Jonathan
